titles.title: Police Accountability and Community Engagement Act of 2020
Police Accountability and Community Engagement Act of 2020
To authorize the Attorney General to make grants to improve the relationship between the police and the communities they serve, and for other purposes.
PAC Act
Police Accountability and Community Engagement Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Police Accountability and Community Engagement Act of 2020 or the PAC Act
This bill authorizes the Office of Community Oriented Policing Services within the Department of Justice to make grants that facilitate organized dialogues to build trust, increase accountability, and reduce tension between the community and the police.
